Class StatProperty

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ControllerProperty
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.g4.G4Property
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.g4.StatProperty
public class StatProperty extends G4Property
A statistical property encapsulates traffic data for one binning interval.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter
